content: नितरां {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Wholly, entirely, completely, प्राणांस्त्यजामि नितरां तदवाप्तिहेतोः <ls>Ch. P. 41</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 96.</ls> {@--2@} Exceedingly, excessively, very much; तुदंति चेतो नितरां प्रवासिनां <ls>Rs. 2. 4</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 10</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 18</ls>; शोषितसरसि निदाघे नितरामेवोद्धतः सिंधुः <ls>Pt. 1. 104</ls>; नितरां नीचोस्मीति <ls>Bv. 1. 9.</ls> {@--3@} Continually, always, eternally. {@--4@} At all events. {@--5@} Certainly. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> In a low tone. {@--7@} Downward.
